title: Rekindle Your Romance
seo_title: Rekindle Your Romance  | Offers at Wine Country Inn
seo_description: Relax and take a break and let romance blossom with a stay at the Wine Country Inn.
long_description:
Relax and take a break and let romance blossom with a stay at the Wine Country Inn. Set the mood with a chilled bottle of sparkling wine, local chocolates, and a rose petal turn down waiting in your guest room. Loved ones will have the ultimate relaxation experience with two 60-minute Classic Swedish Spa Treatments included. Of course, complimentary Wine Country breakfast is included every morning as well as a wine tasting on Friday and Saturday evening in our Winery House!

Package Includes:

  • Split of Schramsberg Sparkling Wine
  • 12 Piece Chocolates from local Chocolatier Woodhouse Chocolates
  • Romantic Rose Petal Turndown
  • Two 60-Minute Classic Swedish Spa Treatments
  • Special discounted Winery tasting Experiences at Freemark Abbey and Markham Vineyards 
  • Complimentary Wine Country Breakfast each morning

The Romance package is priced at $375.00 for TWO adults, including tax and gratuity (room rate and room tax not included). Two-night minimum stay is required. Reserve any two nights, select the desired room type and add on the Romance package option.
